strapiPost.title: Explore Eden Highlights How To Become A Host
strapiPost.content:
Explore Eden not only makes camping accessible to campers, it provides an approachable opportunity for individuals or families to become hosts and make income off of land.

  • The process: Becoming a host is easy through the Explore Eden app. You simply select “Become a Land Host,” add your property, then wait for a notice of approval sent within 48 hours! Almost anything with an outdoor element makes a great listing. 
  • The perks: You can choose your property’s availability through a customizable calendar and set your own prices. Becoming a host allows you to create income as well as give people the ability to connect with nature through your property. 

Download the Explore Eden app HERE.
